recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, onion, garlic, tomato sauce, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Simmer. Combine with spaghetti.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients: Broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, soy sauce, garlic, olive oil
recipes.instructions: Chop veggies. Stir-fry in oil with garlic. Add soy sauce and cook for 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, milk, egg, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk and egg. Fry on pan until golden brown.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.ingredients: Chicken breast, lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olive oil, lemon juice
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken. Chop vegetables. Mix all with dressing.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, chocolate chips, baking soda
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients. Scoop onto baking sheet. Bake at 180°C for 12 minutes.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.ingredients: Tomatoes, basil, onion, garlic, olive oil, vegetable broth, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer and blend.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.ingredients: Taco shells, ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, taco seasoning
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Fill shells with ingredients.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Lasagna
recipes.ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ricotta, spinach, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese
recipes.instructions: Layer ingredients in baking dish. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.ingredients: Greek yogurt, honey, granola, mixed berries
recipes.instructions: Layer yogurt, honey, berries, and granola in a glass.

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, butter, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs. Cook in buttered pan until set.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, curry powder, coconut milk
recipes.instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and spices. Simmer with coconut milk.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.ingredients: Bread, avocado, salt, pepper, lemon juice, chili flakes
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with seasoning and spread on toast.

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients: Rice, eggs, soy sauce, green onion, oil
recipes.instructions: Scramble eggs. Add rice and soy sauce. Stir fry until combined.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing and toppings.

recipes.name: Mango Smoothie
recipes.ingredients: Mango, yogurt, honey, milk
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, butter, tomato, cream, spices
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken in spiced tomato butter sauce. Add cream and simmer.

recipes.name: Fruit Salad
recipes.ingredients: Apple, banana, grapes, orange, honey, mint
recipes.instructions: Chop fruits and mix with honey and mint.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.ingredients: Bell peppers, rice, tomato, onion, cheese
recipes.instructions: Stuff peppers with mixture and bake for 25 minutes.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.ingredients: Bread, eggs, milk, cinnamon, sugar, butter
recipes.instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture. Cook on skillet until golden.

recipes.name: Mac and Cheese
recipes.ingredients: Macaroni, cheddar cheese, butter, milk, flour
recipes.instructions: Cook macaroni. Prepare cheese sauce. Combine and bake.
